text.div:
US Standard Occupational Classification

US Department of Labor Bureau of Labor Statistics Standard Occupational Classification system (Occupational Group codes) see https://www.bls.gov/soc/ for more information

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.hl7.org/us/ecr/CodeSystem/oes

name: US Standard Occupational Classification
